2026-01-21:
Weekly Highlights

UCS Integration Expansion

Enhanced Hyperswitch<>UCS tunnel with Bank Debit, BankTransfer PaymentMethod, Incremental Authorization flow, and updated metadata types

Authentication & Security Enhancements

Implemented OIDC authorize/token flows, embedded tokens, MIT using limited card data, and authentication service webhook integration

Network Tokenization

Added NT eligibility API in v2 and WASM changes for Peachpayments network token flow

Connector Platform Improvements

Enabled order create for Nordea, added settlement split flow for Xendit, and enhanced Cybersource, Worldpaywpg, and Adyen connectors

Core Platform Features

Introduced balance check support, dual refunds validation, theme versioning API, and processing_account_id via metadata

Weekly Highlights

Connector Improvements

Multiple connectors (JPMorgan, Peach Payments, Gigadat, Volt, Worldpaywpg) received updates including production URL configurations, payload masking, field passing for capture/void operations, and Apple Pay decryption support.

Core Infrastructure Refactoring

Significant backend improvements including the removal of DynamoDB calls, refactoring of the euclid crate, merging of shadow and rollout configs for HS<>UCS tunnel, and general configuration updates.

Webhook & Routing Enhancements

Webhook event filtering was improved to support separate query paths, and the router now includes guest customer support in payment method list responses.

Security & Access Control

Implementation of granular preprocessing flows for authentication and passing access tokens for CreateOrder, Capture, and Void operations.
